x_nuvo_diag_probes.name: Clinical WO shows Inactive WO types
x_nuvo_diag_probes.remediation: Please add override reference qualifier to the Work Order types to include only active true Work order types.
x_nuvo_diag_probes.sys_name: Clinical WO shows Inactive WO types

sys_update_version.name: x_nuvo_diag_probes_4178ea241bc5d910ae5b21b5ec4bcbc0
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="x_nuvo_diag_probes"><x_nuvo_diag_probes action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><description>Clinical work Orders show Inactive Work Order types

 Steps to Reproduce: 
Go into the Work Order Type table;

1) Change one of the options to active=false;
2) Create a new Work Order;
3)In the Work Order Type field, open the list view;
4)All types remain selectable;
5)Select the one that was changed to active=false;
6)Save the Work Order and Notice that you can run it through its full lifecycle with a deactivated Work Order Type

Expected Result:
The user should not be able to observe the deactivated work order type on the work order. Inactive Work Order types</description><healthcheck_type/><name>Clinical WO shows Inactive WO types</name><order>100</order><probe_type/><product_version/><remediation> Please add override reference qualifier to the Work Order types to include only active true Work order types.</remediation><script><![CDATA[var util = new x_nuvo_diag.DiagnosticUtil();
var nuvoloVersionQuery = "name=Connected Workplace^active=true^version<19";
var nuvoloVersion = new GlideRecord("sys_scope");
nuvoloVersion.addEncodedQuery(nuvoloVersionQuery);
nuvoloVersion.query();
if (nuvoloVersion.next()) {
    var dictionaryOverrideGR = new GlideRecord("sys_dictionary_override");
  dictionaryOverrideGR.addEncodedQuery('name=x_nuvo_eam_clinical_work_orders^sys_id=c87f5cb44fa58a00b794a88ca310c7fc^reference_qual_override=true^reference_qualNOT LIKEeam_active=true');
    dictionaryOverrideGR.query();
    if (dictionaryOverrideGR.next()) {
        util.handleOutput('Please include override reference qualifier for the Work Order types to eam_active=true Work order types. ', 'warning', 'HTM Asset Management');
    }
}]]></script><sys_class_name>x_nuvo_diag_probes</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>Prasanna.Phadtare@nuvolo.com</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-07-29 10:31:30</sys_created_on><sys_id>4178ea241bc5d910ae5b21b5ec4bcbc0</sys_id><sys_mod_count>9</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Clinical WO shows Inactive WO types</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Diagnostic Tool" source="x_nuvo_diag">3acdaefd1be7fc107798a9b7624bcb74</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Diagnostic Tool">3acdaefd1be7fc107798a9b7624bcb74</sys_scope><sys_update_name>x_nuvo_diag_probes_4178ea241bc5d910ae5b21b5ec4bcbc0</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>Stefan.Popov@nuvolo.com</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-09-17 11:21:27</sys_updated_on><tool>diagnostic</tool></x_nuvo_diag_probes></record_update>
